workflow.name: Generate news cards from Spotify emotions with LLM, Google News and APITemplate.io
workflow.description:
## üìÑ Workflow Overview

Title: Spotify Emotion-to-News Card Generator (APITemplate.io + Slack)

## What it does:
This workflow analyzes the emotion of your recently played Spotify track using OpenRouter (LLM), fetches a related trending Google News article, generates a visual news card with APITemplate.io, and posts it to Slack.

## üë• Who‚Äôs it for

Music lovers, marketers, and developers who want to automatically turn their listening mood into a visual daily digest or Slack update.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works

Spotify Trigger ‚Äî Fetch your recently played tracks.

LLM (Emotion Analyzer) ‚Äî Infer the main emotion from the track title and artist.

Google News Query ‚Äî Build an RSS URL based on the emotion keyword.

RSS Reader ‚Äî Retrieve trending news headlines.

APITemplate.io ‚Äî Render the top article into an image card.

Slack ‚Äî Post title, link, and card image into your channel.

## üß∞ Requirements

Spotify API credentials

OpenRouter API key

APITemplate.io account (with template ID)

Slack OAuth2 connection

## ü™Ñ How to customize

Replace the APITemplate.io template ID with your own.

Adjust the RSS URL language (hl=en-US ‚Üí hl=ja-JP for Japanese news).

Modify the Slack message text for your preferred channel tone.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer

If you use community nodes (LangChain), this template is for self-hosted n8n only.

parameters.text:
=You are an emotion analyst.
Given the following song title and artist, infer the main emotion it conveys 
(e.g., joyful, nostalgic, melancholic, energetic, angry, romantic).
Return JSON.

Input:
"{{ $json.track.name }} - {{ $json.track.album.artists[0].name }}"

Output:
{
  "emotion": "nostalgic",
  "reason": "The song's tone and lyrics evoke reflection and memory."
}

nodes.name: Post to Slack (Title + Link + Card URL)

parameters.content:
## üìÑ Workflow Overview

Title: Spotify Emotion-to-News Card Generator (APITemplate.io + Slack)

## What it does:
This workflow analyzes the emotion of your recently played Spotify track using OpenRouter (LLM), fetches a related trending Google News article, generates a visual news card with APITemplate.io, and posts it to Slack.

## üë• Who‚Äôs it for

Music lovers, marketers, and developers who want to automatically turn their listening mood into a visual daily digest or Slack update.

## ‚öôÔ∏è How it works

Spotify Trigger ‚Äî Fetch your recently played tracks.

LLM (Emotion Analyzer) ‚Äî Infer the main emotion from the track title and artist.

Google News Query ‚Äî Build an RSS URL based on the emotion keyword.

RSS Reader ‚Äî Retrieve trending news headlines.

APITemplate.io ‚Äî Render the top article into an image card.

Slack ‚Äî Post title, link, and card image into your channel.

## üß∞ Requirements

Spotify API credentials

OpenRouter API key

APITemplate.io account (with template ID)

Slack OAuth2 connection

## ü™Ñ How to customize

Replace the APITemplate.io template ID with your own.

Adjust the RSS URL language (hl=en-US ‚Üí hl=ja-JP for Japanese news).

Modify the Slack message text for your preferred channel tone.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Disclaimer

If you use community nodes (LangChain), this template is for self-hosted n8n only.

## Start on Schedule (Cron)
‚ÄúTriggers this workflow on a fixed schedule. You can adjust interval in node settings.‚Äù

## Fetch Spotify Recently Played
‚ÄúRetrieves your last played Spotify tracks. Requires Spotify OAuth2 credentials.‚Äù

## Emotion Analyzer
‚ÄúUses LLM (OpenRouter) to infer the dominant emotion from song title and artist.‚Äù

## For Each Track (Batch)
‚ÄúProcesses each track individually for emotion-to-news mapping.‚Äù

## Build Google News RSS Query
‚ÄúConverts emotion into a Google News RSS query string. Modify hl and gl for language/country.‚Äù

## Fetch Google News RSS
‚ÄúReads top articles matching the emotion keyword.‚Äù

## Pick Top News & Format
‚ÄúSelects the first article from RSS feed and prepares title/link/snippet.‚Äù

## Generate News Card (APITemplate)
‚ÄúCreates a news card image using APITemplate.io. Replace template ID with yours.‚Äù

## Post to Slack (Title + Link + Card URL)
‚ÄúPosts the generated card, title, and link to Slack. Unfurling disabled for clean appearance.‚Äù

## Setup (Step-by-Step)

Goal: Analyze your recent Spotify listening history, infer the emotional tone, and generate a matching news image card that‚Äôs automatically posted to Slack.
Prerequisites: n8n (Cloud or Self-hosted), and active accounts for Spotify, Slack, APITemplate.io, and OpenRouter.

1) Create Credentials (Required)

Spotify OAuth2 ‚Äî Go to Settings ‚Üí Credentials ‚Üí New ‚Üí Spotify OAuth2, create a credential, and assign it to the ‚ÄúFetch Spotify Recently Played‚Äù node.

Slack OAuth2 ‚Äî Create it under Settings ‚Üí Credentials, and assign it to ‚ÄúPost to Slack.‚Äù

APITemplate.io ‚Äî Create it under Settings ‚Üí Credentials, and assign it to ‚ÄúGenerate News Card (APITemplate).‚Äù

OpenRouter API (LLM) ‚Äî Create it under Settings ‚Üí Credentials, and assign it to ‚ÄúInfer Emotion from Track (LLM).‚Äù
If you‚Äôre concerned about Cloud compatibility, refer to the ‚ÄúSelf-host / Cloud‚Äù alternative described below.

main.node: Post to Slack (Title + Link + Card URL)
